value.title: DAX Fridays #155: How to set default value of a slicer in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show you how to set the default value of a slicer in Power Bi using some simple DAX.  Previous video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q4hF4CwJsFE SELECTED value tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FI1_N-imBxI&vl=en  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: DAX Fridays! #20: Parent and Child Functions -Hierarchies
value.excerpt: In this video we will go through how to work with hierarchies using the following DAX functions: PATH, PATHLENGTH, PATHITEM, PATHITEMREVERSE, PATHCONTAINS  The example used will be a simplified bill of materials (BOM) but in the microsoft documentation, there is an excellent example for employees and

value.title: DAX Fridays! #80: DATESBETWEEN
value.excerpt: In todays video we are going to cover the DAX function DATESBETWEEN.  DATESBETWEEN function allows you to calculate amounts between two dates you specify.   For example, if you want to calculate the sum of sales between two specific dates, this is the perfect function for you.  You can "hardcode" the

value.title: Fill down and replace null/blank values in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to troubleshoot fill down and replace blank values.  If you are trying to fill down blank values or replace null values you might see that power query ignores it completely. In this video I will show you how to fix this issues. value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)
value.excerpt: In today's video, I am going to show you how you can do running totals or cummulative totals in Power Query, but do this only if you have no way to do it using DAX.  Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Power BI Shows Incorrect Measure Total? How to fix it?

Sometimes, we have multiple tables in our report and we have prepared some DAX expression to calculate some values in our report.

value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions

value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI

value.title: Power BI Apps and App Workspaces: How to distribute Power BI content to a Large Audience
value.excerpt: Power BI Apps are a terrific way to distribute your Power BI content to a large audience.  You can "Publish App" to Entire Organization or specific individuals and groups. Then any user (within the Group you provided Access to) can click "Get Apps" to consume your App - which comprises the Dashboards,
